_header: When I was poor then was I free

Bod622.First Lines:
Wan y was pore þan was y freWenne y gan gedere þo let y
                    be…
Bod622.Last Lines:
…Alas richesse so mich in thouthTo day y was riche and now
                    haue y nouth
Bod622.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.18.

BLCottCleoDVIII.Transcription:
Whan I was pore þan was I freWhan I gan geder þan lete I
                    beWhat I was ryche þan was I hardAnd er I wyste I died amyd
                    wardAlas ryches so muche in þowȝtTo day I was ryche &
                    now haue I ryȝt nowȝt
